title: Render Monitor
description: An iOS/iPadOS app to track Blender render status and preview frames remotely.
details: Built using SwiftUI, Firebase, and RevenueCat. It allows artists to monitor long-running renders on their mobile devices with real-time updates.

title: ChatOverAir
description: A peer-to-peer ephemeral chat application for private communication.
details: Utilizes MultipeerConnectivity and Combine for serverless, local communication. Focused on privacy and ephemeral messaging without data persistence.

title: Marathi AI Audio Detection
description: Deep learning system for classifying human vs. AI-generated Marathi speech.
details: Achieved 99.68% accuracy using a CNN-based architecture. Solves the challenge of identifying deepfake audio in regional languages.

title: Defake Video Detection
description: Multimodal system combining FER and BERT for deepfake detection.
details: Investigates inconsistencies between facial emotions (FER) and audio sentiment (BERT) to identify manipulated video content.

title: VRET for Hydrophobia
description: VR-based exposure therapy project for treating fear of water.
details: Developed using Blender and Unity. Published as a book chapter research. Provides a safe, controlled environment for therapy.
